version_description:
- Added new ECG patterns
- Improved pacer/defibrillator behaviour
- Various bug fixes and improvements

- Added new ECG patterns
- Improved pacer/defibrillator behaviour
- Various bug fixes and improvements

- Added new ECG patterns
- Improved pacer/defibrillator behaviour
- Various bug fixes and improvements
- Allowing users to more easily manage their registered devices
- Allowing users to more easily manage their registered devices
- Allowing users to more easily manage their registered devices
- Fixing an issue which could prevent an instructor controlling multiple student devices.
- Fixing an issue which could prevent an instructor controlling multiple student devices.
- Fixing an issue which could prevent an instructor controlling multiple student devices.

Scenario Builder
- Create detailed scenarios in advance, customizing waveform changes, parameter trends and investigations.
- Pre-prepared scenarios can then be replayed, and the prepared changes are sent automatically to the student monitor
- The intuitive "draw, drag & drop" interface allows complex scenarios to be designed in minutes
- Store scenarios for future use and share them with colleagues using the import/export feature
- Automatic triggering allows scenarios to respond automatically to time delays, defibrillation, or pacing changes.
